body: Can't it be `tryMove(n->next(), MoveSide::BEFORE)`? `next()` is always valid because of the circular list. `n->next()` may be the `return_node()` but that is ok as long as the topo_index of that node is set to INT_MAX. This would allow MoveSide to be removed and everything to be implemented in terms of moving before something else.

This would allow MoveSide to be removed and everything to be implemented in terms of moving before something else.
